text: Lycée Jean Jacques Rousseau is a senior high school/sixth-form college in Sarcelles, Val-d'Oise, France, in the Paris metropolitan area. It was originally an annex of the Lycée de Montmorency that opened in October 1960 but it became independent in January 1965 and moved to its current location in October 1966. it has 1,735 students."Historique du lycée." Lycée Jean Jacques Rousseau. Retrieved on September 8, 2016. students from Villiers-le-Bel attending general high school studies go to Rosseau, because Villiers-le-Bel does not have its own general high school. () "C'est ainsi que Villiers,[...]mais d'aucun lycée d'enseignement général. Les jeunes vont au lycée Jean-Jacques Rousseau de Sarcelles." ==History== Throughout the decades the student population increased, from 1,600 students in 1975 to 2,400 students in 1989. The school had insufficient agents de service by the 1990s, with only an increase from 49 agents in 1975 to over 30 agents in 1989, and then a decrease to 28.5 positions in 1994."Diminution du nombre d'agents de service au lycée Jean-Jacques-Rousseau, à Sarcelles 10e législature ." Senate of France. Question n° 08198 was written by and published on 20 October 1994, on page 2499; the response by Minister of Education François Bayrou occurred on 29 December 1994, published on page 3082. By 2016 the school had 1,800 students. That year employees of the French offices of Deloitte provided assistance to the school. 15 students who engaged in a playwriting workshop were featured in the documentary Changer de regard; they were in the level prèmiere ES (equivalent to the U.S. 11th grade or the British first year of sixth-form college). ==Programmes== the school has a programme in which students act as beekeepers. ==References== ==Further reading== * " Collection Témoignages : Avoir 18 ans, vivre à Sarcelles et passer son bac." France Culture. 8 June 2015. * ==External links== * Lycée Jean Jacques Rousseau Category:Lycées in Val-d'Oise Category:1960 establishments in France Category:Educational institutions established in 1960
title: Lycée Jean Jacques Rousseau (Sarcelles)
